description: CNN is creating an online memorial for people who have died from Covid-19. If you have someone you'd like to honor, share their story using the form below.
title: We want to hear about those you've lost
title_page: We want to hear about those you've lost - CNN
maintext: (CNN) CNN is creating an online memorial for people who have died from Covid-19. If you have someone you'd like to honor, share their story using the form below. You can also direct message us on Instagram @CNN
